meta.title: Raneem Althaqafi – Sovereign AI Portfolio
meta.description: Full-stack AI innovator blending technology with poetry. Explore my journey in AI, robotics, and creative computing.

tagline: Split the neuron and you'll find the rhythm

about.story1: In a computer lab in Taif, she was no ordinary child. There, Raneem discovered a new language – writing her first lines of code in C at a young age, opening her eyes to a world of possibilities.
about.story2: The girl grew, carrying a metallic dream. With dedication, she built a robotic arm that mimicked human fingers, achieving second place in the global RoboFest championship. In every gear and wire, she saw creativity meet engineering.
about.story3: Raneem didn't only write poetry on paper; she wrote it in machine languages as well. An Arabic poem in her heart finds its way into an algorithm; every function and program she wrote carries a hidden rhythm from her poetry.

milarity.title: MILARITY
milarity.desc: A full-stack system for the Saudi Air Force, combining cloud engineering and AI analytics to deliver a sovereign, secure dashboard for air missions.

nasa.title: NASA Space Challenge
nasa.desc: First-place winning project in NASA's global space debris challenge, utilizing advanced technologies for tracking and analyzing space objects.

aramco.title: Smart Helmet
aramco.desc: Smart helmet system developed for Saudi Aramco, integrating advanced sensors with AI analytics to enhance worker safety.

bci.title: Brain-Computer Interface
bci.desc: Advanced research in brain-computer interfaces, using neural signal processing and machine learning to understand and translate brain activity.

liveness.title: Liveness Detection
liveness.desc: Advanced liveness detection technology using rPPG, enabling user authentication through remote heart signal analysis.

siraj.title: Siraj Assistant
siraj.desc: Intelligent assistant for Riyadh Metro, using natural language processing and AI to help passengers with navigation and inquiries.

poetry.title: Poetry & Art
poetry.desc: Creative project transforming Arabic poetry into visual art using AI, combining literary heritage with modern technology.
